resources.string: Use the Azoth Staff to undo the Azoth Seal and unlock the gate.
Find Simon Grey's investigation of the Ancient's Technology.
Use the Azoth Staff to translate the Azoth Scripts in the Excavated Caverns. Hidden within the Azoth Scripts is a clue to unlocking the Bridge Mechana.
Find the Broken Vestibule. The Azoth Script indicates a power source is located in the chamber.
Activate the Vestibule's Azoth Seal to restore the Bridge Mechana.
Defeat the Abomination and Find the Hallowed Candle.
Place the Hallowed Candle on the Spectral Shrine.
Defeat Foreman Nakashima and the Lost Workers.
Find What Remains Of Simon Grey.
Return to the surface to pursue the truth of Simon's research.
Navigate through The Starstone Barrows and defeat Greundgul the Regent.
Explore the halls for a path to the Shattered Obelisk.
Use the Azoth Staff to enter the Sealed Chamber.
Continue to explore the ancient complex.
Navigate through the Forbidden Passage. Gain Arcane Protection to pass through the barriers.
Continue to explore for a path to the Shattered Obelisk.
Use the Azoth Staff to gain access to the Shattered Obelisk.
Defeat the Obelisk's guardians and then approach the Shattered Obelisk.
Search for a way to navigate through the arcane barriers.
Search for the key to gain entry to the Crypt of the Regent.
Obtain the Obelisk Key from the Ornate Chest.
Disconnect the power lock on the Ancient Shrine to disable the arcane barriers.
Use the Ancient Shrine to bless the Obelisk Key.
Use the Blessed Obelisk Key to enter the Crypt of the Regent.
Proceed into the Crypt of the Regent.
Follow the broken path to the Obelisk Cavern.
Locate the Hallowed Candle and bring it to the Spectral Shrine.
Exit the excavation and return to the Shattered Obelisk.
Uncover the secrets of the ancient magical site.
Uncover the secrets of the ancient magical site.
Use the azoth glyphs to seal shut the Ancient Azoth Portals.
Continue to explore the Lazarus Instrumentality.
Unlock the Azoth Seal to open a way forward.
Defeat the guardians blocking the path.
Return up the stairs of The Tributarium towards the Bathe Chambers.
Cleanse yourselves in Azoth Imbued Water.
Proceed to The Last Walk and begin the next trial.
Survive until the trial has completed.
Continue further into the Lazarus Instrumentality.
Unlock the Azoth Seal from the Bathe Chambers.
Navigate towards the Heart of the Lazarus Instrumentality.
Defeat the onslaught of guardians to open a way forward.
Continue towards the Heart of the Lazarus Instrumentality.
Bring the Ancient Guardian Heart to the device at the center of the Lazarus Instrumentality.
Infiltrate the Black Flag Pirates hideout and discover what lies in the depths beneath the cove.
Gain entry to the Black Flag pirates hideout.
Speak with Antonio to learn more about the Black Flag pirates.
Use a ranged weapon to activate the lever and enter the Black Flag hideout.
Track down Admiral Blackpowder and his crew.
Search for a lever to open the gate.
Find a passage down to the ship in the Black Flag Cove.
Look for another lever to open the gate.
Proceed into the Dry Rum Passageway.
Navigate around the blocked passage and search for a fuse to ignite the explosives.
Defeat the Black Flag alligators and pirate crew.
Proceed through the open gate and continue to search for a fuse to unblock the collapsed passage.
Pick up the fuse from the toolbox.
Take the fuse back to the collapsed passage in the Dry Rum Passageway.
Ignite the fuse to detonate the explosives and open the blocked passage.
Proceed to the Black Flag Cove.
Use the lever to lower the bridge and board the ship.
Defeat the last of the pirate crew and First Officer Wells.
Find the lever to lower the bridge and get off the ship.
Make your way through the Cavern of Forbidden Plunder.
Speak with Tye to learn more about the gate.
Open the gate to the Sunken Depths.
Find the Azoth Seal locking the Ancient Mechana
Activate the Ancient Mechana with 3 Azoth Staffs
Use Teleporter to Exit Ambush Area
Search for a key to unlock Thorpe's Chamber
Use the Azoth Seal to Restore the Bridge
Find a key to unlock Thorpe's Chamber
Return to Thorpe's Chamber with the key
Use the Portal to pursue Thorpe
Get Through the Barrier with 3 Azoth Staffs
1 Azoth Staff, 1 Mining Pickaxe, 1 Harvesting Sickle
Find the source of the Blight, and learn how to cleanse it.
Collect a sample of the Concentrated Blight. It will be useful to understanding more.
Search for a way forward. The lower garden exits are choked with Concentrated Blight.
Defeat Taxodius, guardian of the nursery.
Seek an Imbued Shrine to cleanse the Concentrated Blight.
Clear the Blighted Pool of Fiends.
Cleanse the sample of Concentrated Blight.
Plant the Azoth Seed at the Imbued Font and Defend the Sapling.
Gather a Sapling branch. It will be useful.
Search for the Purifying Flame to clear the walls of Concentrated Blight.
The Caretaker has lost his way. Defeat him and seek a Purifying Flame.
Light the Purifying Flame using the Azoth Sapling. A shrine has been revealed.
Use your Azoth Staff to carry the Purifying Flame and clear the way.
Use the purifying flame to clear the Concentrated Blight.
Use the map chamber to locate the Blighted Heart of Genesis.
Carry the Purifying Flame to the Conservatory. Defend the Flame Bearer.
Go now to the Blighted Heart of Genesis. It must be purified.
Return to the surface, the Blighted Heart of Genesis has been cleansed.
Return to the surface, the Blighted Heart of Genesis has been cleansed.
Get past the guards and find your way to the fleet.
Clear the cave and destroy the Monolith.
Place powder kegs at the ships' sterns and the door.
Set up rockets on the rock to detonate the powder kegs.
Continue forward in search of more ships.
Defeat Commander Chen and the Maidens.
Place a powder keg at the stern of the ship.
Keep moving, find the next ship to destroy.
Move to the Barracks in search of the Captain.
Defeat the Shipyard's Captain for gate keys.
Find Empress Zhou at the palace.
Stop Ser Loth before he harnesses the Primoridal Power of the Forge
Pursue Ser Loth through the secret entrance
Destroy the Ancient Guardians and wield the Empyrean Flame to Destroy the Ice Wall
Make your way to the upper bridge
Extend the Ancient Bridge to delve deeper into the ruins
Travel deeper into Glacial Tarn's ice caverns
Continue exploring the ice caverns for a path back into the Empyrean Forge
Defeat the Ancient Guardians protecting the bridge
Activate the Ice Seal to reconstruct the central bridge and finish the ancient elemental portal
Work together to open a path into the Forge
Defeat Ser Milosh and cross the lava flooded pathway
Defeat Ser Loth and sever the Varangian Knight's connection to the Primordial Magic
Return and report Ser Loth's defeat
Return and report Ser Loth's defeat
Return and report Ser Loth's defeat
Return and report Ser Loth's defeat
Pursue Ser Loth and eliminate the Varangian Presence in the Forge.
Find a way through the Main Gate
Find a way to unlock the Ancient Mechanism
Eliminate The Heel to clear a path
Pursue Ser Loth and his commanders
Find a way through the blockade
Return to report on the defeat of Commander Marius
Return to report on the defeat of Commander Marius
Investigate The Ennead and discover what secrets the Ancients hid in this timeless place.
Investigate The Ennead and discover what secrets the Ancients hid in this timeless place.
Defeat Shai and his minions to open the door and explore the depths of the Ennead
Find a way through the defenders of the Ennead
Use the power of 3 Azoth staves to destroy the corruption blocking the way forward
Battle through the remnants of the 19th Legion
Reach the Apex of the Ennead
Pursue Isabella into a corrupted dimension of reality.
Make your descent towards the Gate of Madness
Destroy the Corrupted Monolith to open the Gate of Madness
Continue your descent towards the Basilica
The path forward is locked. Search for a way to unlock it by ascending the stairs to the Dark Watchtower.
Enter the portal at the base of the Dark Watchtower
Make your way through the Void Tunnel
Acquire the key to the Cellar of Despair from the Dilapidated Chest
Use the Cellar Key to access the Cellar of Despair
Defeat Vroeg and then proceed through the Cellar of Despair
Continue through the Corrupted Graveyard towards the Basilica
Proceed through the gate and enter the Basilica
Pursue Isabella further into the Basilica
Survive against the ambush of Corrupted
Pursue Isabella once more towards the fallen chandeliers
Cross the Sea of Corruption and eliminate the Void Destroyer blocking the path
Use the Azoth Staff to unlock the Reliquary
Carry the Reliquary across the Sea of Corruption
Return the Reliquary to Isabella and gain access to the City of Darkness
Defeat the Priests before they can complete a ritual and create an explosion of corruption
Enter the portal into the Void Tunnel
Make your way through the Void Tunnel
Enter the portal into the Void Tunnel once more
Make your way through the Void Tunnel
Lure Shah Neshen the Devourer from the sands of Brimstone and trap the colossal leviathan.
Prevent Apophis from reawakening the mighty Ancient, Sutekh, or all of Aeternum shall be flung into madness.
Explore the Necropolis and Exit the Soul Trial
Are you sure you want to leave Soul Trial?
Are you sure you want to leave Soul Trial?\nYou will be unable to queue for Soul Trial again for <font color="#ffdb7a">[{time}]</font>.
You cannot fast travel while in Soul Trial
Enter the Undercroft below, where mystic steel and profane deed entwine. Destroy the Flawed Heartgem and break free the Curse of Caer Dun.
Approach the Cursed Altar at the heart of Caer Dun
Place the Flawed Heartgem upon the Cursed Altar
Smash the Flawed Heartgem and release the Curse of Caer Dun!
Use your Azoth Staff to dispel the Curse of Caer Dun
Explore the Undercroft and Exit the Soul Trial
Hunt down the two beast lords, Kurok and Mahantaram.
Find a way to unlock the ancient gate
Transfer the orb to the vessel by the ancient gate
Use the Azoth staff to unlock the gate to Rockfall
Defeat the beasts guarding the path forward
Locate another ancient orb and carry it to its vessel by the Ancient Gate
Carry the orb to its vessel by the Ancient Gate
Use the Azoth staff to unlock the gate to Sunken Shrine
Defeat the beasts guarding the pressure plates
Activate the pressure plates to open the exit from Sunken Shrine
Locate the ancient orb and carry it to its vessel by the Ancient Gate
Carry the orb to its vessel by the Ancient Gate
Push forward toward the den of the beast lord
Search for the other beast lord
Search the area and move the two orbs to the vessels by the ancient gate: 0/2
Use the Azoth Staff to activate the bridge
Move the two orbs to the vessels by the ancient gate: 1/2
Push up the hill to the den of the beast lord
Stop Malek's plans to hatch the eggs of the Devourers.
Approach the center of the arena
Defeat Hadish Azar, Keeper of Flame
Confront Malek and put an end to his plans.
Gather your allies and stop Hadish Azar and the plans to hatch the eggs of the Devourers.
Approach the center of the arena
Take a moment to collect yourself
Take a moment to collect yourself
Defeat Hadish Azar, Keeper of Flame
Defeat Hadish Azar, Keeper of Flame
Explore and then exit the Soul Trial
Gather your allies and stop Hadish Azar and the plan to hatch the eggs of the Devourers.
Gaea's most cherished grove, tilled by sacred vessels and tended by blessed divinity, yet through aeon's wake remains unprofane and sacrosanct. Adiana will not be pleased.
Prepare to face the wrath of Adiana
Return to the surface and Exit the Soul Trial
Defeat Hadish Hazar and his minions
Withstand the heat of The Hatchery
Claim the riches of the desert in victory
Defeat Shah Neshen in the desert arena
Withstand the brutal and acidic hazards
Claim the riches of victory over the wurm
Enter and show humility, mortal, you who dares entreat with the Lord of all Mammoths, Eldest of the Tribunal.
Finish your tasks, and collect remaining loot. When you are ready, you may exit the Soul Trial through the Portal

Hear us, Artemis, celebrated queen, eternal and Ancient, of a noble mien: In arrows rejoicing and on all to shine, bow-bearing Goddess, Diana divine; O'er Motherwell presided, Wild Creator and more, glorying in this Elysian war.
Finish your tasks, and collect remaining loot. When you are ready, you may exit the Soul Trial through the Portal

The Pontifex of New Corsica has been transformed by the powers of the Pyramid that destroyed her realm centuries ago. Born anew, now the living embodiment of the Curse of Medusa. What began in Brimstone Sands must now end here.
Finish your tasks, and collect remaining loot. When you are ready, you may exit the Soul Trial
Accept Daichi's challenge, and defeat him in a duel.
Whispers entwined with corruption have found this faithful heart.
It is a place of horror and beauty intertwined, where the eye betrays the mind. A realm that we cannot comprehend. Leap, and know what is truly unknowable beyond the gates.
Stop Mordred from bringing about an eternal winter.
Descend into the ancient Rune Forge and claim victory over its guardians.
Align the runes to reactivate forge machination
Use the environment to your advantage
Descend into the ancient Rune Forge with a team and claim victory over its guardians.
Align the runes to unlock the ancient machination
Defeat the guardians of the forge
Defeat the guardians of the forge
Eliminate the rest of the defenders
Keep your eyes on the beast in the cage
Descend to the depth of the forge
Find your way to the Winter Rune
